head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CHAPMAN, JOHN HAVEN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CHAPMAN, JOHN HAVEN

block.p: CHAPMAN-John Haven, Of New Canaan, CT. On May 26, 2000. Survived by his wife Jane, his children Jack, Tom, Katie and Meg, his brothers Norman and James and his sister Virginia. Memorial service Thursday, June 1st, 1:30PM at the Stamford Yacht Club, 97 Ocean Drive West, Stamford, CT. Contributions may be made to the South Avenue Cottage, POB 762, New Canaan, CT 06840 or to STAR, POB 470, Norwalk, CT. 06852.
